ctl:function.name: wmtsBootstrap:bootstrap.kvp.get
ctl:function.ctl:description: WMTS v1.0 Bootstrap to cache global variables such as wmtsSchemaPath and to check test prerequisites to determine what can be tested from contents of capabilities document. Returns a document fragment. There are two types of prerequisites; those for whether operations are offered for the KVP GET HTTP interface, and those specific to a particular test or set of tests, independent of HTTP interface.

xsl:when.ctl:message: Server supports KVP GET GetCapabilities and GetTile ... continuing prerequisite check.

xsl:variable.name: Server.KVP.GET.GetCapabilities.Request.AcceptVersions.Valid.Prerequisite-2
xsl:variable.select: every $v in $wmts.capabilities.doc/ows:OperationsMetadata/ows:Operation[@name='GetCapabilities']/ows:Parameter[@name='Versions']/ows:AllowedValues/ows:Value, $d in tokenize($v,'\.') satisfies owsFunctions:validateVersion($v)

xsl:variable.name: Server.KVP.GET.GetCapabilities.Response.TileMatrixSet.WellKnownScaleSet.Prerequisite-2
xsl:variable.select: some $wkss in $wmts.capabilities.doc/wmts:Contents/wmts:TileMatrixSet/wmts:WellKnownScaleSet satisfies boolean($wkss = 'urn:ogc:def:wkss:OGC:1.0:GlobalCRS84Scale' or $wkss = 'urn:ogc:def:wkss:OGC:1.0:GlobalCRS84Pixel' or $wkss = 'urn:ogc:def:wkss:OGC:1.0:GoogleCRS84Quad' or $wkss = 'urn:ogc:def:wkss:OGC:1.0:GoogleMapsCompatible')

xsl:otherwise.ctl:message: Server does not support KVP GET GetCapabilities and GetTile ... failed prerequisite check. No other test will be executed.

xsl:otherwise.ctl:message: Server does not support KVP POST GetCapabilities and GetTile ... failed prerequisite check. No other test will be executed.

ctl:function.name: wmtsBootstrap:bootstrap.soap.post
ctl:function.ctl:description: WMTS v1.0 Bootstrap to cache global variables such as wmtsSchemaPath and to check test prerequisites to determine what can be tested from contents of capabilities document. Returns a document fragment. There are two types of prerequisites; those for whether operations are offered for the SOAP POST HTTP interface, and those specific to a particular test or set of tests, independent of HTTP interface.

xsl:when.ctl:message: Server supports SOAP POST GetCapabilities and GetTile ... continuing prerequisite check.

xsl:variable.name: Server.KVP.GET.GetCapabilities.Request.AcceptVersions.Valid.Prerequisite-2
xsl:variable.select: every $v in $wmts.capabilities.doc/ows:OperationsMetadata/ows:Operation[@name='GetCapabilities']/ows:Parameter[@name='Versions']/ows:AllowedValues/ows:Value, $d in tokenize($v,'\.') satisfies owsFunctions:validateVersion($v)

ctl:function.name: wmtsBootstrap:bootstrap.restful
ctl:function.ctl:description: WMTS v1.0 Bootstrap to cache global variables such as wmtsSchemaPath and to check test prerequisites to determine what can be tested from contents of capabilities document. Returns a document fragment. There are two types of prerequisites; those for whether operations are offered for the RESTful HTTP interface, and those specific to a particular test or set of tests, independent of HTTP interface.

xsl:variable.name: getTileRESTful
xsl:variable.select: every $lay in $wmts.capabilities.doc/wmts:Contents/wmts:Layer satisfies some $ru in $lay/wmts:ResourceURL satisfies $ru/@resourceType = 'tile'

xsl:when.ctl:message: Server supports RESTful GetCapabilities and GetTile ... continuing prerequisite check.

xsl:variable.name: gfiResourceURLs
xsl:variable.select: every $lay in $wmts.capabilities.doc/wmts:Contents/wmts:Layer[wmts:InfoFormat] satisfies some $ru in $lay/wmts:ResourceURL satisfies $ru/@resourceType = 'FeatureInfo'

xsl:otherwise.ctl:message: Server does not support KVP POST GetCapabilities and GetTile ... failed prerequisite check. No other test will be executed.
